title: How to finish the NCERT biology book for class 11 in 1-3 days - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Biology has various diagrams and important concepts which help us understand the activities occurring in plants and human beings. In order to help students get expertise in these topics we as teachers prepare notes using NCERT Solutions for Class 11 Biology. To get an accurate idea about the concepts covered under each chapter and to finish the book within 1–3 days they can refer the NCERT solutions.
